name: welcome sweet baby
description:
So simple & so sweet. This wooden hoop holds embroidered linen displaying the wee ones Birthdate and Name.

A rainbow of buttons frame the stamped stats, creating a gender-neutral color scheme that will fit any home decor.

The sophisticated hoop comes ready for hanging. It's also very lightweight, making it perfect for anyone who enjoys hanging art at the child's level.

What a perfect gift for the New Year arrival!
Or a new way to display how it all began for your older child.

Because each order is handmade, your button details might vary from the picture. This ensures that your item is a one-of-a-kind item to keep or give away. 

Simply include the name and birthdate in your order.

name: wee elephant greeting
description:
This sweet elephant has brought your newest arrival a wee gift.

Embroidered in red on neutral linen, this elephant is balancing a black button-ball.

Stamped in black ink are the stats for the tiniest member of your family.

This keepsake is framed in a 6in wooden hoop, ready for hanging. A simple design welcoming your simple winter baby.

Since each plaque is custom-made to order, and I use recycled/thrifted buttons, there may be some variations. This just ensures that yours is a unique item.

name: personalized tote with trio of flowers
description:
3 button-flowers grace the front of this simple tote. The flowers are embroidered by hand and the front can be custom ordered with any name or word. 

The bag in the photo is lined in a green dotted fabric that, unfortunatly, is no longer available. Your lining will be in the green family, unless you note that you prefer another color family. Anything is possible.

At 9in X 7.25in, it will fit all the essentials.
Camera, Pen, Journal...
Sandwich, Water Bottle, Wallet...
Diaper, Snack, Wipes...

The ink and embroidery can withstand the wash.
There's even a linen pocket inside the bag.
I can stamp up to 2 lines on the front.

name: personalized wall decor
description:
3 button-flowers grace the front of this wall hanging. 

The flowers are embroidered by hand onto a neutral linen, and the front can be custom ordered with any name or word. 

The wooden hoop is 5in. by 9in. Perfect for tucking onto a bookshelf, or hanging in the hallway.

This listing shows the family name. 
But I can just as easily stamp "Welcome", "Wipe your Feet", or "Don't Feed the Bears".

Simply include the name or words you'd like in your order.

Since each item is custom-made to order with recycled buttons, the buttons used for flowers might vary. This provides you with your own, unique item.

name: solar system birth date
description:
Our 8 heavenly bodies are strung atop the stats of the newest wee babe in your life.

Surely to become a family keepsake, these 8 button-planets have been sewn onto natural-colored linen. The child's name has been stamped in black ink.

Look closely & you'll see our own moon!

The sophisticated 6 in. hoop comes ready for hanging. It's also very lightweight, making it perfect for anyone who enjoys hanging art at the child's level.

What a perfect reminder of that wonderful day.

What a perfect gift for the latest winter arrival!
Or a new way to display how it all began for your older child.

Because each order is handmade, your button details might vary from the picture. This ensures that your item is a one-of-a-kind item to keep or give away. 

And while I may be a genius in real life, this solar system should not be used in studying for your mid-term.

Simply include the name and birthdate in your order.
